snippet.title: While Waiting - Official New Platforms Trailer | Wholesome Direct 2024
snippet.description: While Waiting is a comedic puzzle adventure game developed by Optillusion. Clear the game by doing nothing, but discover the power of acceptance and patience in numerous situations from birth to death. Learn to embrace life as you wait with While Waiting, coming to iOS, Apple Arcade, Android, and PC (Steam) at a later date.
